data.name: Rise of Peles
data.detailed_description:
Join our official discord


About the Game

Support us by Wishlisting:



Incarnate a freshly transformed vampire, fight in epic combats and unlock mighty weapons through crafting. Expand your workshops and manage your lineage to craft the ultimate equipment. Venture through the universe of Peleș and follow the path to victory!

Authentic and Original Vampire Story


Journey through the 4 acts of this unique vampire mythology in a fictional fantasy universe inspired by the 18th century. Be the legendary hero of the adventure, fight to recover your stolen land, build and improve your castle and defeat mighty creatures.

Extensive Crafting System


Bite and transform humans into vampires and recruit them into your Lineage. Arrange, automate and maximise your crafting workflow to improve its efficiency, get the best artisans to craft unique, mighty weapons and pieces of armor.

Brutal, Bloody Combat


Fight humans, monsters and other creatures using an tactical-oriented combat system. Dodge, block and master the true art of vampire combat, using special abilities, swords, daggers, axes and more.

Evolutive Decision-Based Story


The decisions you make during the game will not only affect the outcome of the scene you are in right now but will also affect the future relationships and options that will show up further in the game. Choose your path wisely!

Complete Progression System


Create and develop your character to match your favourite playstyle. Every action you do will add points to your characteristics while not using an action will slowly decrease them. Depending on that, your character’s appearance will change in the course of the game.

Time Matters


Vampire gameplay and crafting are based on a scaled day & night time system. Control the flow of time during combat, teleport, dash and use your super-slow abilities to defeat your foes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 X6 / Intel Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, Radeon HD 7870 / GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, Radeon RX 590 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violent combat content with blood.
